steps.title: Stock up on blazers, skinny or straight-leg jeans, chino shorts, cardigans, crew-neck sweaters, button-downs, polos, t-shirts, and tank tops.
steps.content: Stock up on blazers , skinny or straight-leg jeans, chino shorts, cardigans, crew-neck sweaters , button-downs, polos, t-shirts, and tank tops. Stripes add flavor to an otherwise solid-color outfit. Small polka dots are okay as well, in moderation. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Layer!
steps.content: Layer! Wear button-downs under sweaters or blazers and cuff the sleeves. Put a blazer or cardigan over a t-shirt or tank-top. Experiment with layering and see what works for you. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Belts
steps.content: Belts can come in handy when tying an outfit together. Make sure to own at least one brown and one black leather (or faux leather) belt.

steps.title: Wear sports bras on a regular basis, unless you prefer regular bras or a regular bra is absolutely necessary.
steps.content: Wear sports bras on a regular basis, unless you prefer regular bras or a regular bra is absolutely necessary. Sports bras are comfortable and make your chest appear a little smaller. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Acquire some boat shoes, loafers, canvas shoes, and dark-colored or tan flip-flops.
steps.content: Acquire some boat shoes , loafers, canvas shoes, and dark-colored or tan flip-flops.

steps.title: Find a nice watch that you can wear every day.
steps.content: Find a nice watch that you can wear every day. Also, invest in a good pair of sunglasses (Ray Bans, aviators, etc.).

steps.title: Don't be afraid to wear some funky socks.
steps.content: Don't be afraid to wear some funky socks. They can be easily hidden from sight, or you can roll up your pant legs to show them off. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Purchase a messenger bag or purse to carry things around when needed, but don't have it with you all the time.
steps.content: Purchase a messenger bag or purse to carry things around when needed, but don't have it with you all the time. Buy a wallet which you can slip into your back pocket when you leave your bag behind.
